name: I'm on a watcher duty 2: Paranormal in Gensokyo
name_original: I'm on a watcher duty 2: Paranormal in Gensokyo
description:
A sequel to the first "I'm on a watcher duty". This time, it takes place in Gensokyo. Enjoy.

MMD Model credits:

すけ - Flandre Model (MMD)

えと - Cirno model

Alvrit - SDM Interior stage

montecore - Rumia model

Other credits:

Paulor94 - Main creator of this fangame

Notovia (Zaster) - Original creator of "I'm on observation duty"

This game was made with a bunch of Unity free assets so most assets aren't belongs to me. All credits for the model go to their respective owners. (There's too many of them so I can't list them here. Sorry.)

Most picture in the painting are from Google.
